Name: Jasmine Lassi Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fragrant cardamom and jasmine cooled with yoghurt and ice. Best consumed with a Madras.
History: Created in 2012 by Simon Difford at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
